visualization module¶

class visualization.visualization¶

Bases: object

draw_table(dic)¶
Description

prints a table with the given values .

Parameters

dic (dictionary.) – The dictionary whose keys are the headers and items are values .

Returns

none.

live_visualization(values)¶
Description

Plots a live visualization for the input vs the number of iterations.

Parameters

values (dictionary whose key is the label(str) and whose items are the values(float) of that label.) – input values to be graphed.

Returns

none.

view_photo_sample(sample, w, h, rgb)¶
Description

Displays an RGB or gray scale image from an input array and saves it in sample.jpg file.

Parameters

  • sample (array of float or int with image size and any shape.) – input sample as an array of pixels.

  • w (int.) – required image width.

  • h (int.) – required image height.

  • rgb (bool.) – states wether the image is rgb or gray scale.

Returns

none.

visualize(X, Y)¶
Description

plots a graph for the given x,y values and can plot multiple y values for the given x value.

Parameters

  • X (dictionary whose key is the label(str) and whose items are the values(float) of that label.) – The label and values on the x axis.

  • Y (dictionary each key is the label(str) and each associated items are the values(float) of that label.) – The values on the y axis associated with its name

Returns

none.

visualize_multiple_XY(xlabel, ylabel, d)¶
Description

plots a graph for the given input.

Parameters

  • xlabel (str.) – The value printed on the x axis.

  • ylabel (str.) – The value printed on the y axis.

  • d (dictionary with each sub graph label(str) and its x,y(float) values.) – The x and y values for each graph.

Returns

none.
